Sonic the Hedgehog (Sega Classics)

Retro fast-paced platformer — Tesla version is pure nostalgia; at home you get collections, emulators, and extras.

The blue blur’s debut. Sonic the Hedgehog is one of the most famous 16-bit platformers: blazing speed, loops, and emeralds. The Tesla Arcade build is a straightforward emulator version. At home, collections on PC and console add rewind and save states, making retries far less punishing.

Tesla vs Platform comparison

Tesla version

  • Classic Genesis/Mega Drive version.
  • Controller required: Yes

  • Controller required; best with D-pad style control.
